HelpTooltip:
ABOUT 
 Record and manage training examples pairs to train a dyanmic time warping machine learning model. This node records a series of inputs for every inputs / output pairing.  This is used with only with DTW Machine Learning Model.  Live In port connects to one or more feature extractors or data types for recording the pose you are recording. Target Values Output port  connects to one game object movement feature or data type node to make the series of inputs, target value pairing. Output Data node. Recorded Data Out port connects to the Recorded Data In port on the Machine Learning Model node. Start recording starts to records the series of inputs taking a new input value every frame and when pressed again it pairs this with the current output value. The current input and target value are displayed in the centre of the node.
PortTooltip: Connect from Feature Extractor or Data Type node. Live input data to record
Connect from Feature Extractor or Data Type node. Target Value for input pair
Connect to DTW Machine Learning System
BottomError: You cannot add or edit Live Data In or Target Values as you have started recording data
